title: Anyone got news on Mord's effects?
body:
It'd be really fucked up if Lord Mord got an effect taken away and didn't get unique effects... especially since Ziggs is just randomly getting all his effects updated, including more-unique effects for ones that are more similar to the default.

Yeah, they've been doing a lot of vfx updates lately, but this Ziggs one has the most changes being made that aren't just colors.
